name: Stahp!
description:
Made for 4-Hour Jam!

This was a project that was supposed to get me back on track with Godot Engine after quite a long hiatus.

It may not be finished (game loop contains about half of what I wanted to implement), but I've learned (relearned?) a lot.

It's the first project I've finished and no, I'm not 13 (which you might think based on the "artwork").
